page.title: 14WATCHING SPORT
page.content:
AN ACTIVITY ROOM, WEIGHT TRAINING ROOM, BAR,WET AND DRY CHANGING ROOMS,SAUNA AND SOLARIUM.(FROM PREVIOUS PAGE.)
{WATCHING SPORT. SEVERAL CLUBS PROVIDE EXCELLENT FACILITIES AND ENTERTAINMENT FOR THOSE WHO ENJOY WATCHING SPORT IN THIS AREA. HEADINGLEY RUGBY UNION CLUB IS SITUATED IN THE VALLEY BOTTOM, WITHIN SIGHT OF KIRKSTALL ABBEY.FURTHER NORTH LIES HEADINGLEY THE "MECCA"OF YORKSHIRE SPORT.HERE BOTH TEST AND COUNTY CRICKET IS PLAYED AND,ON THE OTHER SIDE OF THE GRANDSTAND,THE LEEDS CLUB HOST RUGBYLEAGUE MATCHES AT FIRST DIVISION,COUNTY AND INTERNATIONAL LEVEL.BOTH ARE SIZEABLE GROUNDS AND PROVIDESPLENDID AMENITIES FOR THE SPECTATOR:(SEE NEXT PAGE)
